de.rojer.sounds

Class SoundFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.rojer.sounds.SoundFile

  • public class SoundFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Use this class to load in an audio file (.wav format!)
    Version:
    18.03.2019
    Author:
    Rojer

        Load in an audio file
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the file
        fileName - the name of the file (with extension!)

      • SoundFile

        public SoundFile(java.lang.String fullPath)
        Load in an audio file
        Parameters:
        fullPath - the path to the file with the name of the file already included (Basically: path + "/" + fileName)
